education.institution: Illinois Institute of Technology, Chicago, Illinois
courses: Data Structure, Algorithm, Machine Learning, AI-Language Understanding, Data Mining, Linear Optimization, Regression, Information Security

projects.name: Machine Learning PaaS Web Application
projects.summary: Developing a scalable Machine Learning Platform as a Service web app that allows users to upload datasets for clustering or classification. The system uses AWS for distributed processing.
details: Developing proficiency in containerizing applications and managing cloud resources, focusing on automating machine learning workflows for scalable web applications.
Technologies Used: AWS, Python, Flask, pySpark, Docker

projects.name: Chicago TIF Analysis
projects.summary: Collaborated with a team of 5 to analyze the correlation between income, education, and TIF districts in Chicago, uncovering potential inequalities linked to TIFs and their socioeconomic impact on various racial demographics.
details: Led data extraction and filtering to ensure clean, relevant data for analysis aligned with the project requirements, enhancing overall project accuracy and reliability.
This role improved my knowledge of data processing and critical analysis, deepening my understanding of data’s role in highlighting social and economic disparities.
Results: Found a 50% income gap between predominantly white ($76K) and non-white ($38K) TIF districts, indicating potential biases in fund allocation.
Technologies Used: Python, Pandas, GeoJSON, k-Means Clustering

projects.name: Wine classification with Naïve Bayes classifier
projects.summary: Implemented a Naïve Bayes classifier to categorize wine reviews, reducing label categories for efficiency.
details: Learned that removing stop words during preprocessing significantly impacted model performance, highlighting the importance of feature engineering in text classification.
Results: Achieved Macro-averaged F1-score: 0.7115, Micro-averaged F1-score: 0.7728
Technologies Used: Python, Pandas, Numpy, Matplotlib

projects.name: Unsupervised Learning-Based Comparison for News Article Topic
projects.summary: Conducted a performance comparison of models (ANN, Gemini, GPT) for news topic classification.
details: Enhanced my knowledge of essential NLP techniques for handling text data and gained experience in evaluating model performance to select the most suitable algorithm for the task.
Results: Gemini offered 10% higher usability, while ANN achieved the highest accuracy with high computational demands.
Technologies Used: Python, NLTK, Word2Vec, TensorFlow

Volunteer Experience.summary: Led a squad of 10 in executing missions, emphasizing strategic communication and cohesion.

Leadership Experience.name: Korean Students Association (KSA), Illinois Tech
Leadership Experience.summary: Organized monthly events to strengthen community ties within IIT, fostering a collaborative and inclusive environment.
Leadership Experience.detail: Hosted a keynote speaker featuring Google’s Senior Designer with 100+ student attendees from college campuses across Chicago.
